31#ifndef DEFS_H_
32#define DEFS_H_
33
34#include <sys/types.h>
35#include <sys/param.h>
36
37#ifdef HAVE_INTTYPES_H
38#include <inttypes.h>
39#endif
40
41#ifdef HAVE_STDINT_H
42#include <stdint.h>
43#endif
44
45#include <stdio.h>
46#include <stdlib.h>
47#include <string.h>
48
49#define NEWARRAY(type,ptr,size,where,action) do { \
50 if ((ptr = calloc(sizeof(type), (unsigned)(size))) == NULL) { \
51 (void) fprintf(stderr, "%s: can't allocate %lu bytes\n", \
52 where, (unsigned long)(size * sizeof(type))); \
53 action; \
54 } \
55} while( /* CONSTCOND */ 0)
56
57#define RENEW(type,ptr,size,where,action) do { \
58 type *_newptr; \
59 _newptr = realloc(ptr, (size_t)(sizeof(type) * (size))); \
60 if (_newptr == NULL) { \
61 (void) fprintf(stderr, "%s: can't realloc %lu bytes\n", \
62 where, (unsigned long)(size * sizeof(type))); \
63 action; \
64 } else { \
65 ptr = _newptr; \
66 } \
67} while( /* CONSTCOND */ 0)
68
69#define NEW(type, ptr, where, action) NEWARRAY(type, ptr, 1, where, action)
70
71#define FREE(ptr) (void) free(ptr)
72
73#define ALLOC(type, v, size, c, init, incr, where, action) do { \
74 uint32_t _newsize = size; \
75 if (size == 0) { \
76 _newsize = init; \
77 NEWARRAY(type, v, _newsize, where ": new", action); \
78 } else if (c == size) { \
79 _newsize = size + incr; \
80 RENEW(type, v, _newsize, where ": renew", action); \
81 } \
82 size = _newsize; \
83} while( /* CONSTCOND */ 0)
84
85#define DEFINE_ARRAY(name, type) \
86typedef struct name { \
87 uint32_t c; \
88 uint32_t size; \
89 type *v; \
90} name
91
92#endif /* !DEFS_H_ */
93
